sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from '@angular/core'; import { trigger, transition, style, animate } from '@angular/animations'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homes', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], animations: [ trigger('fadeInOut', [ transition(':enter', [ style({ opacity: 0 }), animate('600ms', style({ opacity: 1 })), ]), transition(':leave', [animate('600ms', style({ opacity: 0 }))]), ]), ], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { days: number = 0; hours: number = 0; minutes: number = 0; seconds: number = 0; private intervalId: any; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { this.updateCountdown(); // Actualizar el contador cada segundo this.intervalId = setInterval(() => { this.updateCountdown(); }, 1000); } ngOnDestroy() { // Limpiar el intervalo cuando el componente se destruya clearInterval(this.intervalId); } private updateCountdown() { const currentDate = new Date(); const targetDate = new Date('August 19, 2023 00:00:00'); const timeDifference = targetDate.getTime() - currentDate.getTime(); if (timeDifference > 0) { this.days = Math.floor(timeDifference / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); this.hours = Math.floor( (timeDifference % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60) ); this.minutes = Math.floor( (timeDifference % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60) ); this.seconds = Math.floor((timeDifference % (1000 * 60)) / 1000); } else { // El tiempo objetivo ha pasado, establecer todas las unidades a 0 this.days = 0; this.hours = 0; this.minutes = 0; this.seconds = 0; clearInterval(this.intervalId); // Detener el intervalo cuando el tiempo objetivo ha pasado } } }

{{ seconds }} Segundos
